review: I had tried Chromecast, Apple TV and the Amazon Fire Stick and the amazon fire stick takes the cake!. It was incredibly easy to set up, everything is included and I was streaming within 20 minutes of getting it. Chromecast would cut in and out of service and the apple TV is way overpriced for what it is. I would recommend this to anyone! LOVE LOVE LOVE!
